title: I'm in the high school class of 2022. What day do I graduate? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s quite likely that the official calendar for 2022 has not yet been set. My district and union just recently posted the calendar for the 20–21 school year. You can get an idea of the date by looking at this year’s date. For example, our graduation ALWAYS takes place on a Thursday night. Except in 2008, but that’s a whole nuther story. This Thursday is the first or second Thursday in June. Find out how your school has handled graduation in the past, and you’ll have an idea of your exact date in 2022. In my district, June 2 and June 9 are the first two Thursdays. Based on past school years, June 2 is too early, so it’s almost certainly on June 9.

You graduate when i graduate. I’m a Sophomore as well, class of 2022. You graduate different times and days it depends on what school you’re at. I graduate June 10th, 2022.
